org.drip.product.credit
Class CreditComponent

java.lang.Object
  org.drip.analytics.core.Serializer
      org.drip.product.common.Component
          org.drip.product.common.CalibratableComponent
              org.drip.product.credit.CreditComponent
All Implemented Interfaces:
ComponentMarketParamRef
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bond, CreditDefaultSwap
public abstract class CreditComponent
extends CalibratableComponent

Base abstract class that extends CalibratableComponent on top of which all credit components are implemented.
